marklogic.body:
You can add Deirdra Imus to the growing list of airheads to have already tried Zimmerman and found him guilty.
On Hannity tonight Mrs. Shock Jock (lol) was calling for Zimmerman's head alongside some Black Democratic operative.Â Neither of them saw anything wrong with the Black Pussies placing a million dollar Bounty on Zimmerman.Â
They categorically denied or disregarded every fact from the case that is known.
Now I know that in America Black-on-White crime, including Cold-blooded murder only occurs a few dozen times a day.Â So it is kinda sour apples for a Cracker like me to point out that our White leaders, whoever they are, never take to the streets (not even in the White KKK Hoodies that Blacks fantasize about (lol)) to demand justice OR ELSE!!!
But that's just what's happening again--and in the Nick of Time for the Black Old Guard of Jackson, Sharpton, and FairyKhan.Â That young man's death at the hands of a Hispanic JewÂ is sure to keep them at the top of the Racial heap for another 10 years,Â Â
